Literature.Title: THE DESIGN, SYNTHESIS AND BIOLOGICAL EVALUATION OF THE PEPTIDE DERIVATIVES CONTAINING GUANIDINE MOIETY WITH 5-CHLORO-THIOPHENE-2-CARBOXYLIC ACID CONJUGATES
Literature.Author: Tivari SR, Kokate SV, Shelar UB, Jadeja YS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 443(MIC=30µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 1688(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 96(MIC=250µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes MTCC 442(MIC=250µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 227(MIC=150µg/ml),Aspergillus niger MTCC 282(MIC=500µg/ml)
